title: CIP‐010 Configuration Change Management and Vulnerability Assessments | Hitachi Energy
content: Hitachi Energy installations are provided with documentation which can be used as inputs to change management programs. Hitachi Energy provides services that can assist customers with this requirement for the life cycle of the system.

[X] ASR
